entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
